OOC: in the past couple Moves He and Rockseeker were getting into it. He was on an intercepting course. They are battling infront of the Maximal base ams the Weapon he is using is a sword that has a Par, attack which renders the target parylized for a short period of time. See Ancient threw two daggers at Rockseeker and now is moving to intercept rockseeker. Rockseeker was on a course as a meteor to the maximal base.

EmprzAnastazia@... wrote:In a message dated 12/10/03 8:10:43 PM Central Standard Time, jeramej@... writes:


Ancient: Closes in on his target and Strikes with a parylizing Blow.



OOC: Am I missing something there?  I would consider that a huge no-no in all my years of Role Playing. 

:: Shakes head:: of course... don't know what target he was closing in on & all. A blow to who, etc. 


Stac
